"raid" - A thrilling action-adventure film about a team of treasure hunters who embark on a dangerous mission to find a legendary lost city filled with riches and secrets.

"The Last Ones" - A post-apocalyptic sci-fi film set in a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, and a small group of survivors must band together to fight against a mysterious force that threatens to wipe them out forever.

"The Secret Life of Plants" - A fantasy film that explores the magical world of plants and their ability to communicate with each other and humans. The story follows a young girl who discovers the secrets of the forest and must use her powers to save it from destruction.

"The Time Traveler's Dilemma" - A science fiction film about a time traveler who goes back in time to prevent a catastrophic event from happening, but ends up changing the course of history in unforeseen ways. As they try to fix their mistakes, they must confront the consequences of their actions and the moral dilemmas that come with time travel.

"The Curious Case of the Missing Painter" - A mystery film about a famous painter who disappears without a trace, leaving behind a series of unfinished paintings that hint at a dark secret. As a detective investigates the case, they must navigate a web of lies, deceit, and hidden motives, all while trying to uncover the truth about the painter's fate.
